output.sentences: A male vegan attended a large festival
There were a ton of people there preaching the values of veaganism.
Many types of plants were put in exhibitions showing what kinds of plants can be eaten.
A few animals were included to entertain the children and to preach the evils of eating meat.
However, as the speeches continued into the hot afternoon, he left to go to the water park where it was cooler.
